strategy: Dark Eldar armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Wraithkind Kabals, Harlequins, and Tormentor Titan formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Kabal of the Wraithkind, with Harlequin Allies.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Dark Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Wraithkind Kabals
sections.description: The army must contain one Black Heart Coterie

formations.name: 1 Wraithkind Coterie
formations.units: One Arcon in a unit of Incubi, three Incubi

formations.name: Wraithkind Syndicate
formations.units: One Dracon, six Dark Eldar Warriors

sections.name: Wraithkind Partisans
sections.description: Up to one Wraithkind Partisans for each Wraithkind Kabal

formations.name: Mandrake Throng
extraUnits: Add up to two Mandrakes: 25 points each

formations.name: Haemonculi Coven
formations.units: Haemonculus Ancient, two Haemonculi and four Wracks
extraUnits: Add up to two Grotesques: 25 points each

sections.name: Harlequins
sections.description: Up to one Harlequin formation for each Wraithkind Kabal, and up to one Harlequin Support for each Harlequin Masque

formations.name: Harlequin Masque
formations.units: One Shadowseer, three Harlequin Troupes, one Death Jesters, four Starweavers
extraUnits: Replace four Starweavers with two Harlequin Troupe and one Death Jesters: Free
Add up to three Skyweaver Jetbikes: 25 points each
(0-1 in the army) Add one Solitaire to a Harlequin Troupe: 50 points

formations.name: Harlequin Support
extraUnits: Add up to three Skyweaver Jetbikes: 25 points each

sections.name: Commorragh Navy & War Engines
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Commorragh Navy and War Engine formations

upgrades.title: Wraithkind Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Ravagers
items.description: Add up to two Dark Eldar Ravagers.

items.name: (0-1 in the army) Portable Webway
items.description: Add a Portable Webway Portal to an Archon, Dracon, or Haemonculus Ancient character. This Portable Webway may be used once in a game. After the character's formation (or the formation carrying it) completes an action you may place a small barrage template marker completely within 15cm of the character's unit (or the unit carrying it) and outside any enemy zones of control. This marker counts as a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way. Remove this Webway Portal marker in the End Phase of the turn before any rallying.

items.name: Wraithkind Transport
items.description: Any combination of transport options may be taken to transport a formation, as long as no vehicle has an empty transport slot if possible. Not all units in a formation require a transport vehicle. Transport options selected may only transport units from the same formation.
